Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socketMiddleware.commandPatternClientToServer

Class AddPlayerCommand

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.socketMiddleware.commandPatternClientToServer.AddPlayerCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommandToServer, Serializable
public class AddPlayerCommand extends Object implements CommandToServer
An implementation of the CommandToServer interface. It allows to communicate a command sent by the Player to the Server.
See Also:
